name: my very good game
description:
hello everyy everybody i hope you u are having a nice day

i make this gameam with my frend jusst ball wall games and fendbenaman fearn for th gam breakser's tool kit jim jam

i spend lot's of time on it so pls donate if you lik it so we can make more gams like this in furniture

you play as geogfrey the dorito man and he has to save the day from the evil explodes man by doing soe tricky platforming

there are some bugs i couldnt work out so i hope the gam:

0-sometime's the game crashes on start but not all the time i dont know why

-ther is input lag i cant work out how to get rid ofit i thnk it might be my computer tho so its prbbably okay

-sometim s to many sounds play at once and the nmusic stops playing sorry

yuo can also buy the options dlc for 99.99 if you want to use the options

thank u justt wall for making the art sounds and music he is very good

SERIOUS:

This is a submission for Game Breaker's Toolkit jam. The goal is to make a really bad game.

The game crashes on start but it's not a real error, I just put it there because it's funny, so just press ignore.

The source code is available if for some reason you actually want that.

Art, music and sounds by @justwallgames

Voiceover by @bjlfearn
